components.text: After being inspired by a post on Reddit, I made a watch face that imitates the 'time /t' and 'date /t' commands in the Windows Command Prompt. This was the result:
!Since then, I had a brilliant idea to improve it using AppTimers and show it as a user would type it, every minute.
The result is CMD Time Typed, and looks like this:
!That's a lot better. The source is available on GitHub, and the package is available from MyPebbleFaces. Enjoy!
